data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Trivinho-Strixino, Susana, Shimabukuro, Erika Mayumi (2017): Tanytarsini (Diptera: Chironomidae) from madicolous habitat in Southeast Brazil: new species and new records. Zootaxa 4269 (3): 427-437, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4269.3.6|11 occurrences
